values:
Hmmm so i havnt commented on here in a long while... 

Im paranoid... im a little scared.... 

I'm so close to graduation... then nothing.. a lull in the storm... before I start officially teaching on my own... a class of my own... 


Duluth public schools are so interesting... some of the worst behavior problems i have ever seen... and yet in the chaos a few students come out to be some of the brightest most talented students in the entire nation... How can such opposites exist in one place.... 

If it wasnt for this potential i would probably not want to teach in the area.... 

I am tired of reflecting on my feelings... fuck the person who came up with the concept of a reflection... 

Here's to the next step...

ok woot so im back...

My girlfriend andi is amazing and got me the coolest present ever for my birthday! INDIANA JONES LEGOS!!!! wooot haha they ar
e really cool!

anyway lifes pretty cool right now schools almost done with for the year and Im excited to go to gettysburg this summer but said I will be leaving the state and my andi!.

oh and had a band concert earlier today... was pretty fun... and my last.. kinda happy and sad at the same time...

The Everything Test

There are many different types of tests on the internet today. Personality tests, purity tests, stereotype tests, political tests. But now, there is one test to rule them all.

Traditionally, online tests would ask certain questions about your musical tastes or clothing for a stereotype, your experiences for a purity test, or deep questions for a personality test.We're turning that upside down - all the questions affect all the results, and we've got some innovative results too! Enjoy :-)

Personality
You are more logical than emotional, more concerned about self than concerned about others, more atheist than religious, more loner than dependent, more lazy than workaholic, more traditional than rebel, more engineering mind than artistic mind, more idealist than cynical, more leader than follower, and more extroverted than introverted.

As for specific personality traits, you are adventurious (100%), outgoing (100%), intellectual (67%), innovative (64%).

JK about the subject.... 


I really like skating.... it is a lot of fun.  I like the color blue and green and if you mix them together you get another cool color. 

Anyway woot for all the snow but at the same time boo because it should have come earlier!!! Ice skating is fun... went skating last night with Andi cause she is spectacular and can kick my ass at skating. Woo shout out to you Andi you make my life so incredibly awesome!!

peace out for now homes

H'ok... So I have managed to be apart of one of the most bad ass sports on the face of the planet.  Alpine Skiing. Not just skiing down the Hill but racing. I'm not complaining cause it makes for good stories and kick ass times and I must say I'm going to miss the adventures!

Why Alpine racing is so bad ass. 

1. I get up before the sun for each race.
2. I strap myself to two long boards and set it so that I'm most likely going to break my legs before I eject out of my skis
3. I hurtle myself down a hill at about 20-30mph for Slalom at hardened plastic gates and for Giant Slalom or GS if you will it is about 35-45mph
4. I strip down to a GS suit even when the temp drops below zero such as today at about -20F including wind chill and its going to get worse... Coldest I have raced in was when it was -25F without wind chill and with wind chill it was -45 F.

I just don't know what my motivation is to do this but I got it and I love racing even in the coldest of times...

Just some thoughts on what I do....

H'Ok so Xanga is now dead to me..... dead to me I say!! anyway i'm going to try kickin the dust off this bad boy. 

So yeah life is pretty awesome...Gotta give a shout out to my girl Andi for making it awesome... just wouldnt be  the same with out ya ;) 

ok skiing is also amazing... just takes up a shit load of time and energy and blood... but its awesome... and I love it.... and now i have lots of papers to write.... yey for my major but I shouldn't complain cause I choose my major.... wooo

Hmmmm Perkins is amazing..... so is pie...... Pie is amazing but once you eat it, it's gone.
